issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Pressing Return Key on keyboard does not move the cursor on to the new/next line in TextArea.


Not a regression.
Issue occurs in 3.2.0.GA AND 3.1.3.GA also

Steps to reproduce:

1. Install KitchenSink BaseUI>views>scroll Views>Scroll Views TextArea 
2. Enter some text, tap return 

Expected Result:
2. On pressing return it must go to a new line.

Actual Result:
2. Keyboard disappears.
fields.summary: Kitchen Sink: Pressing Return Key on keyboard does not move the cursor on to the new/next line in TextArea

comments.body:
Issue reproduced on both SDK Version 3.2.1 GA and 3.4.0 GA

CLI version 3.3.0, 
Titanium SDK version 3.4.0 
Titanium SDK version 3.2.1 
iOS SDK: 7.1 
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201407111535
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
